The Quranic researcher is the saying of a dominant Satan.A kindness on the saying of a generous messenger [Al -Takwir: 19], and this is a return to what was divided on it that the Qur’an said a generous Messenger, after that he was broken Recipients indicating an increase in the honor of this saying in the sanctity of his export and the place of his pregnant woman with God and the truth of his receptions from him from the one who does not In it, the sauce was to the oud to enlighten the Qur’an on the occasion of the male of the unseen in the saying of the Almighty: and what is on the absence of a tender [Al -Takwir: 24].For the Qur’an is one of the unseen, which was revealed to Muhammad, and there is a lot of news about the affairs of the unseen paradise and fire and the like.It was known that the guerrilla is a source of the Qur’an; Because he was told about the destiny of the saying that is from the race of the words, when he said: What is the saying of Satan is a dominant, so the expert was from it before the words of the words, so there is no matter Under what is returned to him as a guerrilla and what is on the absence of a tenderness [Al -Takwir: 24].(P-164) This is the heroes of the saying of the partners in it: It is a priest, so they used to claim that the priests gave them the demons with the news of the absence, and he said: Lit when you believe [Al -Haqaqa: 41], nor by saying a priest, a little, you remember [Al -Haqaqa: 42] and he said: And what the demons have been revealed to him, and what he is to them and what they are.The demons [poets: 221] descended on every sinful jaw [poets: 222] and they were claiming that the priest was receiving his Satan and named his Satan.In the hadith of the gate of the revelation, the descent of Surah and the sacrifice: that the Habbah holder is the woman of my father, a flame, and she is a beautiful mother who is a war that said to the prophet.And an active domination in the sense of an effective, that is: a murder.And the domain:
